text: Pradel Pompilus (1914–2000) was a Haitian writer. Pompilus "is considered one of the most respected Haitian scholars."P. Schutt-Ainé, Haiti: A Basic Reference Book, 105 He is best known for his three-volume study of Haitian literature. == Notes == ==References== * Category:1914 births Category:2000 deaths Category:Haitian non-fiction writers Category:Haitian male writers Category:Linguists of pidgins and creoles Category:20th-century non-fiction writers
title: Pradel Pompilus
